meanings.definition: Extremely large or vast in size or quantity.
meanings.sent1: The amount of food at the party was astronomical!
meanings.sent2: The distance between the two cities was astronomical.
meanings.sent3: The number of balloons at the birthday party was astronomical!
meanings.sent4: The size of the giant pumpkin was astronomical compared to the others.
meanings.sent5: The mountain peak reached an astronomical height.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to astronomy or celestial objects.
meanings.sent1: The astronomical event was visible through the telescope.
meanings.sent2: The students learned about astronomical phenomena in science class.
meanings.sent3: The cat's fascination with the stars was truly astronomical!
meanings.sent4: Her love for astronomy was astronomical, leading her to study it in college.
meanings.sent5: The astronaut's job involved studying astronomical bodies in space.
